mapper.sql: id, android_device_policy_id, name_list_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time
mapper.insert: insert into android_policy_list (android_device_policy_id, name_list_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time) values (#{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nameListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into android_policy_list
android_device_policy_id,
name_list_id,
create_date,
create_user,
update_date,
update_user,
delete_time,
#{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update android_policy_list
android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name_list_id = #{nameListId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update android_policy_list set android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name_list_id = #{nameListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.description, t1.is_enable as isEnable, t1.create_date as createDate, t1.create_user as createUser, t1.update_date as updateDate, t1.update_user as updateUser from android_device_policy t1 where t1.delete_time order by t1.update_date desc

select t1.id, t1.blackwhite_name as blackWhiteName from netbehavior_whiteblacklist t1 inner join android_policy_list t2 on t2.name_list_id = t1.id and t2.delete_time is null where t1.delete_date is null and t2.android_device_policy_id = #{id}
select count(t1.id) from android_device_policy t1 where t1.delete_time order by t1.update_date desc
mapper.update: update android_policy_list set delete_time = now() where android_device_policy_id = #{id} and delete_time is null
mapper.select:
select t1.android_device_policy_id from android_policy_list t1 where t1.delete_time is null
and t1.name_list_id = #{params.bwId}
